reviews.review_msg: the best lab prof i've ever met.He's very helpful and knowledgable.

Nice and funny prof. chem366 is not as bad as ppl say. it is deadly hard if you are always doing things at last minute. Just do the labs at normal times and ask for help if needed. i recommend brodovitch=)

very helpful and friendly prof
 knows the stuff well and explains the material well

 a challenging course though, lots of write up
Very helpful teacher! Boring course, lots of write up, take too much time, not very useful

I have graduated several years ago,I came back here to warn students majoring chemistry If you are taking Chem 266 and Chem 366 with her, good luck with that and don't take too many courses at the same time. 6 extremely long Lab reports ,those topics are outdated. Poor communication, not considerate, vague marking scheme
riduculous. irresponsible. unresponsive. unenthusiastic. There I said it
